name: WP Scarcity Jeet – Powerful scarcity and urgency timer for your landing pages
author: Cecil Gupta

sections.description:
Scarcity Jeet is a feature rich timer widget for your landing pages, squeeze pages and articles. You can use it to introduce time-scarcity on any page with your desired call to action.
Leverage the scarcity element and boost your conversions by up to a whopping 350 percent. Scarcity Jeet is a WordPress compatible, highly customizable plugin that grabs your subscribers’ attention and makes them focus on your offers. It creates a timer for your offers on your webpage creating a sense of urgency which boosts conversions.

Demo and Tutorial

Here a few features listed:
* Put in your own image or ecover to attract attention to your product. Lets you hide or highlight the URL image.
* Modifiable text, color, time settings, and catchline to customize as per your discretion.
* Lets you dock your bar to the top or bottom of the page.
* Lets you display your product photo, cartoon or any custom image on the bar or as an overlay.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the wp_scarcityjeet_bonus folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin using the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Get the Scarcity Jeet option inside Settings menu from your sidebar.
  4. For the first time, you need to provide your name and email to get an activation code.
  5. The process is Complete
sections.faq:
Does it display timer

Yes.

Can I cange image, texts and style

Yes, you can.

Can I cange the bar position

Yes, you can place it at the top of the page or at buttom.
